website_summaries.verdict: The type of donut pillow to choose when you want general, comfortable support.
pros: The light pillow is convenient to carry around while traveling or working while sitting for long periods of time
Non-slip bottom will keep the pillow firmly in place on most surfaces
cons: Softer feel of the pillow may not be suitable for post-surgery or injury recovery support

customer_reviews.title: Firm enough to hold, soft enough to do the job
customer_reviews.text: This cushion isn't made of memory foam, so wasn't sure if it'll help me with my post-surgery pain, but after experiencing it a while, it turns out to do a perfect job! It is soft just enough to provide the extra cushioning while not going flat. Cover zips off easily so I can clean it as needed. Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Broken tailbone this is the pillow for you!
customer_reviews.text: Broken tailbone is no fun but this pillow makes it so much easier to tolerate. Would definitely recommend and may buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! Takes pressure off spine. Perfect if you have back pain.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Well worth the money. Wish I'd bought one years ago. We support Velocity of Books, an organization that promotes literacy. Please consider doing the same by making them your charity of choice through Amazon Smile:
customer_reviews.author: Velocity of Books

customer_reviews.title: Relief, Finally!!
customer_reviews.text: I have problems w my coccyx for years due to my previous manual labor job & nothing ever wuite gave me relief. Sure a regular pillow works alright- for an hour or less. With this cushion I can take longer car rides & actually feel relaxed when sittinf for extended periods of time. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great for post partum discomfort
customer_reviews.text: Saved my life after a vacuum extraction during labor left with a bad perineal laceration. This thing went everywhere with me.
customer_reviews.author: mtparadigm

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, looks nice, removable cover to wash if needed. The only draw back was the smell of this item. It really had a chemical like odor when removed from plastic wrapping. It did go away in about 10days.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for one of our friends. She enjoyed using it after her surgery. She expressed it was handy and comfortable. She said it helped her tremendously after her surgery. The outer shell comes to be washed.
customer_reviews.author: fma

customer_reviews.title: LOVD IT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for someone else who was having pain in their tailbone area when sitting too long. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cushion for sitting I’ve ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my pelvic bone so sitting on hard surfaces is painful. Tried a couple others, but were either too hard or just uncomfortable. This one is soft, comfortable and I haven’t experienced any pain since using it for more than a week now. I use this one when I sit out in my lanai. Plan to buy another one for my car!
customer_reviews.author: Geni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect firmness
customer_reviews.text: I tried several donut pillows before purchasing this one. This one is the perfect firmness. Many of the less expensive donut pillows are too soft and flatten as soon as you sit on them. Thus, providing no support. This pillow does not do that. But it is not so firm that it cuts off circulation to your legs. I highly recommend this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W Butler

customer_reviews.title: Pillow relief
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I have a cyst at the base of my tailbone that is very uncomfortable and this pillow reduces the pressure on the cyst, leaving it much more comfortable since I spend most of my time sitting. I broke my leg (extensively) last August and lived in a wheelchair f the majority of the past year leaving me with a sore bum. The pillow has reduced my discomfort dramatically and I truly appreciate the relief I've felt since I started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Venezia

customer_reviews.title: Tailbone relief
customer_reviews.text: After a fall my 91 year old Mother took, it left her with a very sore Tail bone in a sitting position. I ordered the Chesna Dounut Cushion with a little skepticism but as soon as she sat on it, she loved it. The cushion gave her the Tailbone relief she needed! As a rule I normally don't give anything 5 stars, in this case, consider 4 stars a 5 star rating!!
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat firm but still alleviates my pain from hemorrhoids surgery. Proper size and shape and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Usher S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hemorrhoids!
customer_reviews.text: The pillow was comfortable from the first day I started using it. I had one problem, my husband liked it so much he would use it all the time, so I had to buy a second pillow. I really like using it in the car, it makes long trips more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JEL

customer_reviews.title: Made my mother-in-law be quiet
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, the only review I can give this is that it shut my mother-in-law right up! She was complaining about how her skinny butt was hurting after a recent surgery. I ordered this thing to shut her up, and it worked! She seems happy with it so far!
customer_reviews.author: James P.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: way too small for a normal person. If you're a very petite person, then sure I guess? If you're male, I wouldn't even bother with this...
customer_reviews.author: Vini A. Forcella

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected and exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a seat cushion to help bolster me after an upcoming surgery. It works great, is super comfy- not too soft and not too hard, just the right amount of support. I am #135 pound woman and it works exactly and better than I'd hoped when I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Berryhill

customer_reviews.title: Does what it claims
customer_reviews.text: I have tried multiple types of cushions/pillows. This product is without a doubt the best for me, it gave me instant relief. I currently are on the medication Jardiance and this cushion relieves the pain. Will be ordering a second pillow when I see my 10 % discount coupon
customer_reviews.author: Jack Deitrick

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pillow for operations and anything else that  helps
customer_reviews.text: I am short, so this pillow lifts me up to reach and write on my desk and is very comfortable! Helps my tail bone, as well! I would recommend it to anyone who wants it for operations, height and anything else that helps!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M.

customer_reviews.title: Elderly mother loves it and it gives her relief from ...
customer_reviews.text: Elderly mother loves it and it gives her relief from tail bone pain. Takes it with her everywhere she goes.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D.

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Thanks but it was for someone else. They like it
customer_reviews.author: Kelly E Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Helpful after surgery
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use after a gynecological surgery and it was a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy

customer_reviews.title: I had a tail bone injury and found it difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a tail bone injury and found it difficult to sit at my desk. This cushion took the pressure off of my tail bone and has helped me heal.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L Brown

customer_reviews.title: Back Relief!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. Has really helped with my back. Quality of product is nothing less than spectacular. Easy to remove cover makes cleaning a breeze. Liked it so much that I bought one for my office and car.
customer_reviews.author: T3vader

customer_reviews.title: Butt cushion
customer_reviews.text: I did let it air out for a little while before I used it. But after that it was a life saver. I could finally sit on the couch , and go for car rides. It has made me forget my butt is on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Will I.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The cushion did have an odor that subsided after a couple of days of airing out. I found the cushion to have just the right amount of firmness for my weight of 190lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Soft as a cloud!
customer_reviews.text: I fell down the stairs and had a tailbone injury. Couldn’t seat, walk and sleep well because of the pain and discomfort. This pillow has been a game changer for me. Not only I could seat comfortably I could also sleep on my back too and felt no pain. It really took the pressure off my tailbone area, oh! and can’t forget to mention how soft it is; like a cloud.
customer_reviews.author: CasaMia by Julissa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Working great. Light weight. Transports easily. Lost weight and sitting was very uncomfortable. Use in car and in home.
customer_reviews.author: lin

customer_reviews.title: Helps with easing the pain
customer_reviews.text: It did help to ease the pain, I have from falling on my tailbone.
customer_reviews.author: crafty716

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for me !!! I just didn’t had to look for something different!!!
customer_reviews.author: BELLA

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: NIce cushion. I would definitely recommend this product for anyone requiring a donut type cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is intended to do!!
customer_reviews.text: This definitely helps on long commutes to work, relives the pressure in areas in which I need it most. Great product and made well!!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was great. Definitely relieves pressure of tailbone. Perfect for after surgery.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Great product which provides exactly the comfort needed. Perfect in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Christian

customer_reviews.title: Does 100% what it's intended to do!
customer_reviews.text: I had several surgeries and required support and this was perfect! It help alleviate pain and was easy to take to and from home/work. Must buy!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable ، u can sit for 8 hr with no pain in yr back ot tailbone

customer_reviews.title: Too hard and it smells bad
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of the product but the foam is way to hard which made it very difficult to get comfortable. It also smelled bad, I had to air it out for days.
customer_reviews.author: ECS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Only suggestion would be that the cushion be a little bit thicker. I weight 220 and I smashed the pillow down a little more then expected. This product is significantly better then any other product I tried! Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Farwick

customer_reviews.title: Transforms Driving
customer_reviews.text: Great for driving. Just did a 13hour day with no discomfort. Vastly superior to inflatables and never goes flat. Also seems to stay in one spot. Makes driving a pleasure again.
customer_reviews.author: sparky

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a butt saver!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely keeps the pressure off of the center of my pain. If you have a PITA then get this. Oh Yea!!!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got for mom who was suffering with hemorrhoid pain after cancer treatment. Doesn't work that well.

customer_reviews.title: unfortunately I need to return this product. We have ...
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately I need to return this product. We have a very specific need and it has taken many products to find the correct one. It is still in the original packaging. It looks well made, etc, it just does not meet our need.
customer_reviews.author: LAC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it m
customer_reviews.text: Bought it post delivery to ease pain in my tail bone. It doesn’t provide enough cushion/support as I expected it would. Not very useful to ease my pain.
customer_reviews.author: Neha

customer_reviews.title: For my Mom
customer_reviews.text: Was for my Mom, She passed away but enjoyed using it to the end
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Relief for my Arse!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Nice and soft. Has slip resistant bubbles on the part that goes down on the chair so it doesn't move. Lots of relief. Thank you! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: jeanne clark

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had huge expectations regarding this product based on the huge amount of reviews but the product was not up to the expectation. It was very hard and smelled of a rubber so bad that I had to return it. I bought this for my wife for her postpartum so that she could use it .This is very unfortunate. I hope the seller reads this.
customer_reviews.author: Arvind Ramachandran

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I had a Drainage tube from surgery and could barely sit down with this donut seat I had no problem with sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tailbone Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my husband and he has found much comfort since using it both at home and in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Marie D.

customer_reviews.title: At last, true comfort!
customer_reviews.text: From the time I received this wonderful product, my back pain is much more comfortable and the psoriasis on my rear thighs is much less severe. My daughter's suggestion that I purchase this specific product was wise and much appreciated. I'm very happy with it. The grips on the bottom prevent slipping, the centered depression, the oval shape and the firm cushioning add to the comfort, making this product superior to others. And the zipper enables cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: I hoped it would be more comfortable for her too sit on but that is not ...
customer_reviews.text: This did not work at all for us. I bought it for my mom who broke her tailbone. I hoped it would be more comfortable for her too sit on but that is not the case. It is very uncomfortable for her. I wish I could send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Very inexpensive. Perfect !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Very very comfortable. I had to get two. Can be cleaned easily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes; my mother really loves her Chesna Donut. Very soft; and it serves the purpose. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Donut with additional contours front & back for coccyx
customer_reviews.text: Design.....traditional donut was not working for mom. Additional contours made the fit.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product has made a world of difference to sitting on hard chairs in my dining room.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Does the job exactly as it should. Has held up well for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect it got here early and is big enough and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect it got here early and is big enough and Suits him fine
customer_reviews.author: j.d.

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great but I had to return
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great but I had to return. I bought for postpartum for sitting on the couch and it did not work. I think it would be best on a firmer surface like an office chair. It is pretty firm.
customer_reviews.author: JenFelix

customer_reviews.title: Donut
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard and sits me up to high. I have a sore tailbone and it’s not good for that.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Goldilocks Cushion
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 different seat cushions after having prostate surgery. For me, this was the goldilocks seat cushion. Most of the others were too firm or the ring wasn't wide enough. I also like that the foam was removed from the front and back areas.
customer_reviews.author: BruceP

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Most uncomfortable pillow ever. Foam is really hard, never gets softer.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Hope it works better for you
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it would not slid, but it did. My back started hurting a lot after a couple of hours and had to remove it. The donut cushion did not work for me.Hope it works better for you, should you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Adelia Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion. So far
customer_reviews.text: Great cushion. So far, so good. I can now sit pain free! This is what I hoped it would be!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! It is quite firm but I think ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! It is quite firm but I think that'll be beneficial for long term use. Definitely will recommend in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Angelic Satire

customer_reviews.title: Best Cushion Ever
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this question because I sometimes suffer from enlarged hemorrhoids. Working full-time as an assistant is hard because you sit a lot and this cushion has been a phenomenal relief. In addition my nephew recently had a pilonidal cyst removed from his lower back/tailbone area and he has used my cushion when driving. He is also singing it’s praises. I would recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi, Philadelphia

customer_reviews.title: This cushion is all I hoped for. Finally pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: OMG after suffering either in bed or sitting on my Lazy Boy I finally decided to look for relief. I have discomfort in my tailbone area and mild rash on my buttocks. I ordered this after reading all the reviews. They were most helpful. I FINALLY can sit in my Lazy Boy and sleep on my back without pain. The fact they have a removable cover and textured bottom, so it doesn't move, adds to the plus. I would not hesitate to recommend this to anyone. It is the answer to my prayers. I just bought another so I have one in my bed and the other in my Lazy Boy.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Great product for Hemorrhoid / infection or sore by sitting area.
customer_reviews.text: I had hemorroids surgery. First 2 days of recovery was very painful. On the 3rd day my chesna donut cushion arrived and t' was truly lifesaving!! It is perfectly designed to help avoid putting pressure on the affected area. It is not too hard and not too soft. Highly recommended for anyone who has infection, hemorroids or sore by the sitting area.
customer_reviews.author: Dav

customer_reviews.title: Perfect relief!
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this for pressure ulcers I developed while healing from a midfoot fusion surgery & the relief from the pain on my buttocks was immediate. I am sure this will help me heal completely without all the discomfort I was dealing with before. I will write a second review once things are healed.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Fredrickson

customer_reviews.title: Thank heavens for this...
customer_reviews.text: After falling down the stairs and injuring my tailbone, I couldn’t sit in any position. Driving was excruciating. I couldn’t even lay on my side - I had to sleep on my stomach until I finally ordered this! After using this, my healing process is moving much quicker, AND I can sit down!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: It's firm and doesn't budge, but it does exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: It's firm and doesn't budge, but it does exactly what I need it to do. After a tailbone injury, standing up after sitting on normal chairs was quite difficult. This cushion really alleviated the pain from getting up, though sitting on it does take a bit of getting used to. It's not uncomfortable, but it's weird.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: No stars for 'easy to inflate' as this cushion doesn't have to be inflated. So glad I picked this one out. Very comfortable and light weight, I have a large enough clothe shopping bag to carry it in and can sit on the donut when out to eat, ride in the car or drive the car. Love it! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: This cushion is exactly what I needed. It only works on a hard chair surface. If you want it to work on a softer surface, I would recommend using a board or other rigid material under the cushion. It is well made and I appreciate the removable cover that can be washed.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Schentzel

customer_reviews.title: she loves it
customer_reviews.text: She loves it. I thought the shape was strange, but apparently it is a very good feature. Fits well in car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L.

customer_reviews.title: Yes, finally!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other cushions and they just did not work for me! The pain actually got worse (broken tailbone). Immediate return! But(t) that pain is a thing of the past! Honestly, the most comfortable cushion ever! Would definitely recommend to anyone with butt pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me and greatly reduces the weight on sore spot
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want such a thick cushion. This compresses down some - just how I expected. My sore spot does touch the office chair cushion below, but 95% of the weight is off it now. My spot is now healing nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Finger

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable. I have a fistula in the rectal area that gets recurring infections. I went to a doc and they told me to get a donut pillow until I have the surgery to correct the problem. I got this one, and it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Using this pillow works exactly as described and provides a solution that makes a night and day difference compared to sitting in my office chair without it. An awesome solution to a truly painful medical problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Pressure relief Seat cushion
customer_reviews.text: My husband is disabled and has bed sores. I bought this seat cushion to put in his recliner to see if it would help the bed sores to heal. This seat cushion has help to relieve the pressure on the bed sores because of the donut shape and they have finally healed!!! He loves this seat cushion! Thank-you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra K. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Durable
customer_reviews.text: My mother has surgery, I purchased this to help with her discomfort and she loves it. She sleeps on it and sits on it, she says that it really helps the with the pain. I’m very happy I found it.
customer_reviews.author: C.Y.N

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if Im sitting right or if it is supposed to be that squishy
customer_reviews.text: I didnt get any instructions on how to sit on this thing lol I guess it is ok. Its pretty squishy, thought it would be firmer...(I have never had to use one before)
customer_reviews.author: G. Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Great value and does just whats its supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Love this cushion it is very firm and very comfortable after having rectal surgery
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my brother
customer_reviews.text: He had a sore on his behind and sitting was very uncomfortable for him. The pillow has taken the pressure off and allowed some healing.
customer_reviews.author: Annie V.

customer_reviews.title: ... cushion while using the computer or practicing my guitar-I'm happy, very well constructed
customer_reviews.text: I use the cushion while using the computer or practicing my guitar-I'm happy, very well constructed, seller sent a follow up e-mail to make sure I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Bluff

customer_reviews.title: I love this seat cushion!
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat cushion. I have to sleep in a recliner and it was very uncomfortable until I received this seat cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, and won't move
customer_reviews.text: According to the person who I purchased this for, it is extraordinarily comfortable and won't move on the chair while in use.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Antonov

customer_reviews.title: Have a donut!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time; is odor-free, foam does not collapse, zippered fabric, non-slip bottom. Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Stratomaster

customer_reviews.title: Saved my livelihood and my life.
customer_reviews.text: Saved my life, huge pain relief. I have to sit all day for work and it WAS agonizing. I got this cushion and I can actually focus and get things done without the distraction of pain. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough for
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy enough for... well.... err.... ahh - my particular problem. Needs more support - compresses too much to be effective. It's more like a very 'friendly pillow'.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R. Garskof

customer_reviews.title: Relieves tailbone pain.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for relief from tailbone pain. Works great!

customer_reviews.title: Such a relief
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. The cushion lessons the lower back pain.

customer_reviews.text: Great for certain floor exercises on the hard floor - Side leg lifts, while cushioning the hips. This cushion is nice and dense and works well for this.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought for boyfriend. He uses it at work. Arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Healing aide
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use by my husband who suffered from open wounds due to caustic diarrhea. The cushion brought him immediate relief and actually aided in the healing process as he wasn’t putting pressure on the sores. I am so glad we made the choice

customer_reviews.title: Very firm
customer_reviews.text: Too firm I’m abig guy and it becomes uncomfortable after 1or2 hours. Might work better for average sized people

customer_reviews.title: Best butt donut ever
customer_reviews.text: One of best donuts for my bottom I've ever had! And I've had to use donuts for years and years for surgery and hemmorhoids.
customer_reviews.author: YepYep

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a senior citizen who is very happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: Dealing with Prostate issue and it works for me
customer_reviews.text: Dealing with Prostate issue and it works for me, soft and it really helps.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver! I just had an hemorrhoidoctomy and this is saving my life at the moment.

product_meta.title: Chesna Donut Tailbone Seat Cushion for Hemorrhoid Treatment Prostate Post-Surgery Relief Pregnancy Pillow Orthopedic Lift Cushion Made of Premium Comfort Foam for Home Work or Car, Black
feature_bullets: Cushion is made of premium quality dense foam, thus providing long lasting comfort and relief. Extra stiffness added assuring cushion won't flatten out even after prolonged seating
This cushion is perfect for hemmoroids treatment, pregnancy or post surgury relief. Also reduces pressure on lower back, coccyx/tailbone, perineal, pelvic and anal region
Featuring non-slip bottom so cushion isn't sliding away but stays in place. Covered with velour fabric, available in Black and Grey to best meet your taste
Useability and Portability: Ideal for everyday use on any type of chair at home, work or on travel in car, train and plane and on wheelchair. Minimal weight so you can easily take along with you
Easy Product Care: Just zip-off and gently remvoe velour cover for easy home laundering. Machine washable
